lead_paragraph: Each team in the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off will play four games next year under a new format that includes third- and fourth-round games at campus sites. The change will be the third in three years for the 16-team preseason N.I.T. tournament.
snippet: Each team in the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off will play four games next year under a new format that includes third- and fourth-round games at campus sites. The change will be the third in three years for the 16-team preseason N.I.T. tournament.
